Roto Mold Service Platform

Easy access and operator support are critical to maximizing though-put with RotoMold forming. Dual, retractable platforms with on-board tooling lift platforms support easy access by operators for product removal and mold change-over. These 12 x 18 ft platforms break down for easy transport and installation. This large kayak manufacturer required three sets of platforms.
